COMING STRAIGHT FROM NASAR PLANET, we are 8.000 Aliens randomly generated, arriving to Earth to live on Ethereum Layer 2! You can find us in the IMX platform, in the ETH layer 2, which means NO GAS FEES.

MINTING PUBLIC THE 17th OF JANUARY - PRE-SALE ON 15th OF JANUARY

We have noticed that humans are having a very tough time trying to evolve without actually destroying themselves and the planet they live in. We were given the instruction of coming to give a hand and help humanity as we could. We took off from Nasar Planet some light years ago, and finally we are arriving on Earth to start our mission.

A spaceship of 2.000 Aliens is arriving first. Then, every 10 days a new spaceship with 2.000 more is going to land! Until we are 8.000!

Every 15 days, a new Spaceship will arrive on Earth until the fourth.

Owning an Alien gives you preferential access to the pre-sale of the next 2.000 Aliens and a lot of other perks and benefits!

INITIATIVES FOR THE HOLDERS

We are building a family, more than a community. A long-term exclusive group of holders, who will benefit from our SUPER INITIATIVES.

CRYPTO MINING – CRYPTO-ART GALLERY - METAVERSE PARCEL - DONATIONS - BREEDING

All these 5 initiatives are for you. We will periodically send the coins to those who hold at least 3 Aliens of minimum 2 spaceships. We will create a space in the metaverse for our holders. Giving back to all by cleaning the oceans.

  • 0% - FIRST SPACESHIP - 2.000 ALIENS. -

    Launching Pre-Sale of 800 aliens. Minting for 400 Whitelist members. Breeding will only be possible between aliens of different spaceships. Giveaway of 10 NFTs.

  • 10% - PRE-SALE SOLD OUT-

    Giveaway of 100 MyHeritage DNA kits. See more on Discord!

  • 25% -SECOND SPACESHIP (10 days after) . - 2.000 ALIENS -

    Holders of the first spaceship will have preferential access to the pre-sale. Giveaway of 10 Aliens of the Second Spaceship Crypto minery starts. Rewards directly to those who hold Aliens of two or more spaceships.

  • 50% - THIRD SPACESHIP (10 days after). - 2.000 ALIENS -

    Holders of other spaceships will have preferential access to the pre-sale. Giveaway of 10 Aliens of the Third Spaceship Donation 10.000$ to clean the oceans

  • 75% - FOURTH AND LAST SPACESHIP -PARTY ALIENS-

    PARTY ALIENS. - Party Aliens are the craziest Aliens out there. They are unic, weird, funny... Wholesome Aliens.

  • 100% - NASAR ALIENS ARE COMING TO THE METAVERSE

    We will buy a parcel in the Metaverse and build a Crypto-art Gallery for the community. Creation of a Multisig for Council Members. Nasar Aliens will become fully decentralized, and Diamond Handed holders will become the “owners” of the project.

FAQ

What is Immutable X?

Immutable X it’s a growing Platform set on the Layer 2 of Ethereum Network. Ethereum’s Gas Fees are so crazy right now that it makes no sense spending those incredible amounts of money to buy emerging projects. Immutable X, will give you the chance of buying and selling Nasar Aliens without having to pay ANY GAS FEES! Not only that, but the Immutable X project is so promising that gives us a bigger chance of becoming the next Blue Chip NFT in the imminent future! Immutable X future is bright, and so is our!

What about the Art?

Every Spaceship will have different skinned Aliens. - 1st Spaceship -> Flat skin - 2nd Spaceship -> Tabby skin - 3rd Spaceship -> Gradient Skin - 4th Spaceship -> Surprise! The collection will be made of 8.000 Unique Aliens divided into 4 Spaceships of 2.000 each Over 10 Legendary Aliens with 100% Unique & Rare accessories will be randomly sold. Stay updated for exclusive perks!

How will Crypto Mining work?

It will be a Mining Farm powered by renewable energy. Holders will decide which networks to mine. Mined Coins/Tokens will be sent to holders of at least 2 Aliens from different spaceships. (Up to 4 Aliens from 4 Different Spaceships)

Metaverse Parcel:

Nasar Aliens will acquire a Parcel in the metaverse and build a Crypto-Art Gallery The community will decide in which metaverse to settle in (Decentraland / Sandbox / Omnium Space). Suggestions involving the metaverse, will be fully considered and studied since we plan to do big things there!
